document.masterDocTitle: Coralliophilinae (Neogastropoda: Muricidae) from the southwest Pacific

bibRefCitation.author: KOSUGE S. & OLIVERIO M.
bibRefCitation.refString: KOSUGE S. & OLIVERIO M. 2004. - Three new coralliophiline species from Sammlung von Dr. G. Fritsch. Jahrbucher der Deutscher Malakozoologishen the Southwest Pacific (Muricidae: Coralliophilinae). Journal of Conchology Geseltschaft 119 - 146.

paragraph.materialsCitation: TYPE MATERIAL. — Holotype (lv) MNHN 2190 and 9 paratypes (dd) MNHN 2202-2209 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE LOCALITY. —
Norfolk Ridge , 23°42’S , 167°59’E ,
338 m
[SMIB 3: stn DW 18]
.

MATERIAL EXAMINED. —
New Caledonia proper
. LAGON: dd ( paratype MNHN 2207 )
.—
SMIB 8: stns DW154 to DW159, stn 395, Grand Récif Sud , 22°48’S , 167°08’E ,
313 m
, 1 dd. 24°46’S , 168°08’E ,
235-300 m
, 1 dd ( paratype MNHN 2209 ). Norfolk Ridge . SMIB 3: stn DW 8, 24°45’S , 168°08’E ,
233 m
, — LITHIST: stn CP 17, 23°41’S , 168°01’E ,
247-281 m
, 1 dd 1 dd ( paratype MNHN 2202 ); stn DW 18, 23°42’S , 167°59’E , ( paratype MNHN 2208 )
.

338 m
, 1 lv ( holotype MNHN 2190 , Fig. 217)
. —
SMIB 4: Loyalty Ridge . SMIB 5: stn DW 93, 22°20’S , 168°42’E ,
255 m
, 1 stn DW 41, 24°44’S , 168°09’E ,
230-235 m
, 1 dd ( paratype dd. MUSORSTOM 6 stn DW 407, 20°41’S , 167°07’E ,
360 m
, 1 MNHN 2203 ); stn DW 44, 24°46’S , 168°08’E ,
270-300 m
, 1 dd; stn DW 471, 21°08’S , 167°54’E ,
460 m
, 1 dd (Fig. 217)
.

dd ( paratype MNHN 2204 )
. —
SMIB 5: stn DW 75, 23°41’S ,
New Hebrides Arc
.VOLSMAR: stn DW 17, Hunter and Matthew 168°01’E ,
270 m
, 1 dd ( paratype MNHN 2205 ); stn DW 77, Islands, 22°23’S , 171°41’E ,
260-300 m
, 1 dd
.

DISTRIBUTION. —
Southern New Caledonia and the area between the Loyalty and Norfolk Ridges and Fiji , live in
338 m
, empty shells in
230-460 m
.

REMARKS. — Protoconch of 2.3+ conical whorls, 630+ Μm high, 760 Μm wide at base. Protoconch-I of about 1+ whorls, sculptured with pustules over the entire visible surface. Protoconch-II of about 1.3 whorls, with 2 spiral keels,

FIGS 73-87 . Teleoconchs of
Babelomurex
. 73 ,
B. armatus
(G.B. Sowerby [third of the name], 1912), MUSORSTOM 6 stn CP 400, H 27.0 mm. 74 ,
B. shingomarumai (Kosuge, 1981)
, Fiji , BORDAU 1 stn DW 1472, H 16.2 mm. 75 ,
B. purpuraterminus ( Kosuge, 1979 )
, SMIB 5 stn DW 95, H 14.1 mm. 76 ,
B. virginiae Kosuge & Oliverio, 2004
, paratype MNHN 2206, SMIB 5 stn DW 77, H 20 mm . 77 ,
B. natalabies
n. sp. , holotype MNHN 20841, CHALCAL 2 stn DW 81, H 16.4 mm. 78-80 ,
Babelomurex pallox
n. sp. 78 , holotype MNHN 20220, SMIB 8 stn DW 159, H 14.2 mm; 79 , paratype MNHN 20222, SMIB 8 stn DW 154-159, H 16.7 mm; 80 , paratype MNHN 20231, BERYX 11 stn DW 18, H 24.8 mm. 81 ,
B. nakayasui ( Shikama, 1970 )
, SMIB 8 stn DW 159, H 16.7 mm. 82 ,
B. cf. tuberosus ( Kosuge, 1980 )
, SMIB 8 stn DW 181, H 9.9 mm. 83 ,
B. tosanus (Hirase, 1908)
, MUSORSTOM 8 stn CP 970, H 29.1 mm. 84 ,
B. lischkeanus (Dunker, 1882)
, MUSORSTOM 6 stn CP 467, H 41.5 mm. 85, 86 ,
B. spinosus (Hirase, 1908)
. 85 , MUSORSTOM 6 CP 454, H 15.4 mm; 86 , MUSORSTOM 6 stn 456, H 17.7 mm. 87 ,
B. princeps ( Melvill, 1912 )
, MUSORSTOM 8 stn CP 1085, H 40.3 mm.

sculptured with subsutural prosocline threads, and 2 series of opisthocline threads between the keels and above the suture. Threads tending to fuse, to give rise to opisthocline, nodulose collabral ribs.
